explains: adj. 职业的，由职业引起的；占领的
wordGroup: occupational hazard 职业危害；职业危险
occupational accident 职业性意外事故
occupational medicine 职业医学；职业病科
occupational therapist 职业疗法专家

sentences.en: Women have yet to achieve wage or occupational parity in many fields.
sentences.cn: 妇女们在许多领域尚有待获得薪酬或职业的平等。

sentences.en: She will now begin occupational therapy to regain the use of her hands.
sentences.cn: 她现在将开始接受职业疗法以重新使用双手。

sentences.en: Catching colds is unfortunately an occupational hazard in this profession.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，患感冒是这个行业的职业风险。
